text: I have Tesla K80 GPU I would like to use for GPU programming. However, according to NVidia, the cuda compute capability of this card is 3.7. Packages such as CUDA.jl require minimum compute capability of 5.0

elements.text: I have Tesla K80 GPU I would like to use for GPU programming. However, according to NVidia, the cuda compute capability of this card is 3.7. Packages such as CUDA.jl require minimum compute capability of 5.0

text: Ask in <#C689Y34LE|gpu> for better answers. Older versions should still work but might yield suboptimal performance was the last answer i got.
